mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le bocage de P. de Ronsard Vandomoys / dedié a P. de Paschal, du bas païs de Languedoc
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ronsard, Pierre de, 1524-1585
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Chez la veuue Maurice de la Porte ...
mdRecord.dcterms:description: On leaf A4v (1st group): Acheué d'imprimer le vingtseptiéme iour de Nouembre ...

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: First of six titles by Ronsard in one volume. Search by call number to retrieve all titles in the volume. The volume is described in "Bibliothèque de feu m. Hector de Backer" pt. 1, no. 391. Mosaic binding: Bookplates of Baron Jérome Pichon (motto Memor fui dierum antiquoru[m] PS. CXLII) and of Hector de Backer; with unidentified cypher bookplate. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 505.

mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Women in the book industries and trade--France--Paris--16th century
